mapper.insert: INSERT INTO rental_cars (car_code, car_type_code, car_number, model_year, branch_code, car_status, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{carCode}, #{carTypeCode}, #{carNumber}, #{modelYear}, #{branchCode}, #{carStatus}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE rental_cars SET car_type_code = #{carTypeCode}, car_number = #{carNumber}, model_year = #{modelYear}, branch_code = #{branchCode}, car_status = #{carStatus}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE car_code = #{carCode}
mapper.select: SELECT rc.car_code, ct.car_type_name, ct.car_type_code, rc.car_number, cc1.common_name AS car_status, rc.car_status AS car_status_code, b.branch_name, b.branch_code, cc2.common_name AS car_type_category, cc3.common_name AS origin_type, cc4.common_name AS seating_capacity, cc5.common_name AS fuel_type, cc6.common_name AS car_manufacturer, rc.model_year FROM rental_cars rc JOIN branchs b ON rc.branch_code = b.branch_code JOIN car_types ct ON rc.car_type_code = ct.car_type_code JOIN common_codes cc1 ON cc1.common_code = rc.car_status AND cc1.common_kind_code = 'car_status' JOIN common_codes cc2 ON cc2.common_code = ct.car_type_category AND cc2.common_kind_code = 'car_type_category' JOIN common_codes cc3 ON cc3.common_code = ct.origin_type AND cc3.common_kind_code = 'origin_type' JOIN common_codes cc4 ON cc4.common_code = ct.seating_capacity AND cc4.common_kind_code = 'seating_capacity' JOIN common_codes cc5 ON cc5.common_code = ct.fuel_type AND cc5.common_kind_code = 'fuel_type' JOIN common_codes cc6 ON cc6.common_code = ct.car_manufacturer AND cc6.common_kind_code = 'car_manufacturer' ORDER BY car_code
